function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variations in the prevalence of themes across different follower counts on Twitter.","Impact":"Biased representation of public sentiments on loneliness during COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Diversify data collection sources and account for demographic differences in social media users.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for social media sentiment analysis.","People":"Public affected by biased data representation.","Owner":"Research institutes, social media platforms, data scientists."}]}
